title: Return Damaged Goods to Supplier
description: A shipment of raw materials was received with visible damage and needs to be returned to the supplier.

tasks.description: Create a 'Quality Notification' documenting the damage with photos.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a quality report and attaches photographic evidence.

tasks.description: Request a Return Material Authorization (RMA) number from the supplier.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent contacts the supplier and obtains an RMA number for the return.

tasks.description: Arrange for the damaged goods to be shipped back to the supplier using the RMA number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent schedules a pickup for the return shipment.
